## How to assign users to serve as internal support?

Alex is the LMS admin in an organisation and he has been assigned as the
application admin of Curricula. He would like to assign the IT colleagues and
himself as the instructor to help learners and staff who are facing problems
on their trainings, as well as collect feedback for Curricula. Now let’s see
how Alex will configure the internal support setting in Curricula.

1\. In Curricula, Alex clicks **Admin** on the left navigation pane, and then
clicks **Global settings**.

2\. In the **Internal support** tab, he can choose to enable internal support
for staff, learners, or both.

• **Enable internal support for staff** – Alex can select this option to allow
staff to contact support.

• **Enable internal support for learners** – Alex can select this option allow
learners to contact support.

3\. He enters the names of specific users to assign the users as the email
recipients. He can also select users from the address book.

4\. When Alex finishes the assignment, he clicks **Save**.

If he wants to check the configuration, he can click the contact support icon
in the upper-right corner. The email app will be automatically started with a
new email and the recipients will be automatically filled in.
